actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to prepare and establish the USS Nautilus (SSN 571) as a National Monument located at the U.S. Naval Academy, Annapolis, Maryland and to provide certain shoreside facilities for the support of the ship and the convenience of visitors.

summary.text: Designates the United States ship Nautilus as a national monument to be located at the United States Naval Academy at Annapolis, Maryland. Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to maintain such ship and to construct a dredged mooring slip and suitable shoreside facilities for such vessel. Authorizes necessary appropriations to prepare such vessel for public display and to construct such facilities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to prepare and establish the USS Nautilus (SSN 571) as a National Monument located at the U.S. Naval Academy, Annapolis, Maryland and to provide certain shoreside facilities for the support of the ship and the convenience of visitors.
